data.actual_result: calendar tab starts flicking with the from: tabs menu, search button doesn't work and the search returns you to the channel you did the search on.
data.expected_result: able to search and copy paste the name tag easily by deleting additional text.
data.short_description: when pasting a long text in the search bar while deleting the text, the menu starts reacting weirdly and unresponsive.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to bug approval queue, try copy the reporter name tag of xcom bug. - Now paste the whole text in the search bar and start deleting the text to isolate the reporter name. - Pages start acting weirdly and typing anything in search - Observe.
